name: LIFX Buildkite Build Light
description: An example Buildkite webhook endpoint for creating a LIFX-powered build light

LIFX_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: A LIFX personal access token (create one at http://cloud.lifx.com/)

BULB_SELECTOR.description: The selector for which bulb to turn on (see http://api.lifx.com/ for examples)

PROJECT_NAME.description: The name of the Buildkite project whose builds you want to trigger the light

BRANCH_NAME.description: The name of the branch that should trigger the light

SECRET.description: A secret password. You'll add this to the URL when you put it into your Buildkite settings to ensure no-one else can control your build light.
